languages.text:
The Operative immediately inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on each enemy in combat, then makes a free attack against a target (can even use a ranged weapon in melee range). This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>
languages.original_text:
Оперативник немедленно накладывает 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g} на каждого противника в бою, а затем совершает атаку (в том числе можно использовать дистанционное оружие на расстоянии ближнего боя). Эта атака не входит в лимит атак на ход и всегда {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}достигает цели{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Цель этой атаки до конца боя получает штраф −30% к {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}блоку{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броне{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парированию{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>До конца боя атаки оперативника требуют на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} больше.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
- The Adept immediately inflicts 1 clue on all enemies in combat.
- The Adept makes a free attack against a target. It always hits.
- Until the end of combat, the target suffers a -30% penalty to dodge and a -30% penalty to armour.
- Until the end of combat, the Adept's attacks cost +1 AP more.

The Operative immediately inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on each enemy in combat, then makes a free attack against a target (can even use a ranged weapon in melee range). This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

languages.text:
特工立刻对战斗中的所有敌人施加1层{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果，之后无消耗地对目标发动一次攻击（甚至可以使用远程武器对近战范围内的敌人进行攻击）。此次攻击必定{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}目标。
- <indent=5%>受到攻击的目标{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}格挡{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}均降低30%，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>
- <indent=5%>特工的所有攻击耗费的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}提高1点，效果持续至战斗结束。</indent>

-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
El agente inflige inmediatamente +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} a todos los enemigos presentes en el combate y efectúa un ataque gratuito contra un objetivo (incluso puede usar un arma a distancia en cuerpo a cuerpo). Este ataque siempre {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo del ataque sufre una penalización del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloqueo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, los ataques del agente cuestan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} más.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on each enemy in combat, then makes a free attack against a target (can even use a ranged weapon in melee range). This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo del ataque sufre una penalización del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y una penalización del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, los ataques del agente cuestan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} más.</indent>

-<indent=5%>Hasta el final del combate, el objetivo del ataque sufre una penalización del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y una penalización del −30 % a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g}.</indent>

languages.text:
オペレーターが戦闘中のすべての敵に即座に1{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}付与し、ターゲット1体に対してフリー攻撃を行う（近接距離でも遠隔武器を使用できる）。この攻撃は必ずヒットする。
-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、この攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避率{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}ブロック{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}−30%のペナルティを受ける。
-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、オペレーターの攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが+1増加する。</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on each enemy in combat, then makes a free attack against a target (can even use a ranged weapon in melee range). This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、この攻撃のターゲットは{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}−30%、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}−30%のペナルティを受ける。</indent>
-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、オペレーターの攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが+1増加する。</indent>

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}が戦闘中のすべての敵に即座に1{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}付与し、ターゲット1体に対してフリー攻撃を行う。この攻撃は必ず{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}する。

-<indent=5%>戦闘終了まで、オペレーターの攻撃の{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}コストが+1増加する。</indent>

languages.text:
Der Agent belegt sofort jeden Gegner im Kampf mit +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} und hat dann einen kostenlosen Angriff auf ein Ziel (bei dem er selbst im Nahkampf eine Fernkampfwaffe einsetzen kann). Dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer.
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende des Kampfes hat das Ziel dieses Angriffs einen Abzug von −30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocken{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kosten die Angriffe des Agenten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} mehr.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on each enemy in combat, then makes a free attack against a target (can even use a ranged weapon in melee range). This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Der Agent belegt sofort jeden Gegner im Kampf mit +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} und hat dann einen kostenlosen Angriff auf ein Ziel (bei dem er selbst im Nahkampf eine Fernkampfwaffe einsetzen kann). Dieser Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g} immer.
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende des Kampfes hat das Ziel dieses Angriffs einen Abzug von −30 % auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocken{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Bis zum Ende des Kampfes kosten die Angriffe des Agenten +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} mehr.</indent>

languages.text:
L'agent inflige immédiatement +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à tous les ennemis qui participent au combat, puis lance une attaque gratuite contre une cible (il peut utiliser des armes à distance en mêlée). Cette attaque se traduit toujours par un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, une pénalité de −30 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g}, au {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocage{/g}, à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} de la cible de cette attaque.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'attaque de l'agent coûte +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaire.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on each enemy in combat, then makes a free attack against a target (can even use a ranged weapon in melee range). This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

L'agent inflige immédiatement +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à tous les ennemis qui participent au combat, puis lance une attaque gratuite contre une cible (il peut utiliser des armes à distance en mêlée). Cette attaque se traduit toujours par un {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}coup{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, une pénalité de −30 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g}, au {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}Blocage{/g}, à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} et à la {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parade{/g} de la cible de cette attaque.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, l'attaque de l'agent coûte +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaire.</indent>

L'agent inflige immédiatement 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à tous les ennemis qui participent au combat, puis lance une attaque gratuite contre une cible. Cette attaque se traduit toujours par un coup.
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, une pénalité de −30 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de cette attaque.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les attaques de l'agent coûtent +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de plus.</indent>

L'agent inflige immédiatement 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnérabilité{/g} à tous les ennemis qui participent au combat, puis lance une attaque gratuite contre une cible. Cette attaque se traduit toujours par un coup.
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, une pénalité de −30 % s'applique à l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de la cible de cette attaque.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Jusqu'à la fin du combat, les attaques de l'agent coûtent +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} de plus.</indent>

languages.text:
Ajan, çatışmadaki tüm düşmanlarda anında +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürü{/g} oluşturur, ardından bir hedefe serbest bir saldırı gerçekleştirir (yakın dövüş menzilinde menzilli silah bile kullanabilir). Bu saldırı her daim {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Saldırının hedefi; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerlerine −%30 ceza puanı alır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ajan'ın saldırılarının {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli +1 artar. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
languages.original_text:
The Operative immediately inflicts +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} on each enemy in combat, then makes a free attack against a target (can even use a ranged weapon in melee range). This attack always {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the target of this attack suffers a −30% penalty to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}block{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Until the end of combat, the Operative's attacks cost +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} more.</indent>

traits.locale_text:
Ajan, çatışmadaki tüm düşmanlarda anında +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}sömürü{/g} oluşturur, ardından bir hedefe serbest bir saldırı gerçekleştirir (yakın dövüş menzilinde menzilli silah bile kullanabilir). Bu saldırı her daim {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurur{/g}.
-<indent=5%>Saldırının hedefi; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:BlockChance}bloklama{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} değerlerine −%30 ceza puanı alır. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ajan'ın saldırılarının {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} bedeli +1 artar. Etkisi çatışma sonuna dek sürer.</indent>
